title: Wake Me When It's Funny: How to Break into Show Business and Stay
description: This memoir and show-business primer from one of film and TV's most successful writer-producer-director-actors ( Pretty Woman, Happy Days, Laverne & Shirley, Mork & Mindy, Murphy Brown ) gives sound advice on how to create comedy, break into TV, shoot movies, and deal with Hollywood. 40 b/w photos. Garry ("Allergic to Everything but Success") Marshall has written hundreds of TV scripts, produced and created 14 prime-time series, including The Odd Couple and Happy Days, and has written a number of stage plays. This entertaining portrait of Marshall's life takes readers on a tumultuous, behind-the-scenes journey, from his early days to the peak of sitcom success to his work in movies today. 32 pages of photos.
author: Garry Marshall
